feed.title: Category: personal | thecave | Kirby Turner's Blog

entry.description: A year ago today I was snowboarding on Mt. Mansfield. It’s a different story today with warmish temperatures and rain. I’m ready for the start of winter.
entry.content: A year ago today I was snowboarding on Mt. Mansfield. It’s a different story today with warmish temperatures and rain. I’m ready for the start of winter.

entry.description: The kid built his first Mindstorm robot. He has a lot more work to do before next month’s STEM fair.
entry.content: The kid built his first Mindstorm robot. He has a lot more work to do before next month’s STEM fair.

entry.description: I need to burn twenty more calories to close my Activity ring. I’m thinking about walking to the pub that’s down the street to burn the calories…and grab a beer.
entry.content: I need to burn twenty more calories to close my Activity ring. I’m thinking about walking to the pub that’s down the street to burn the calories…and grab a beer.

entry.description: Sad news and too damn early in the season for this to happen. My heart goes out to their family and friends.
entry.content: Sad news and too damn early in the season for this to happen. My heart goes out to their family and friends.
